article_title: Caesars Takes Aim at Law Aiding Creditors
article_text:
Caesars Entertainment Corp. is lobbying to roll back a Depression-era creditor-protection law that could complicate the casino giant’s financial restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter.

The Las Vegas company and its owner, Apollo Global Management LLC, have been working to support legislation that would amend the Trust Indenture Act of 1939, the people said. Some lawmakers, including Democratic Sen. Harry Reid of...
